title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook

```{r}
library(airway)
library(DESeq2)
library(tidyverse)
library(omicsTools)

data("airway")

se <- airway
dds <- DESeqDataSet(se, design = ~ cell + dex)

keep <- rowSums(counts(dds)) >= 10
dds <- dds[keep,]

dds <- DESeq(dds)
res <- results(dds)
res <- res %>%
  as.data.frame() %>%
  rownames_to_column("gene_id")
```

```{r, fig.width=10, fig.height=7}
plot_volcano(res, label_col = "gene_id", labels = "ENSG00000179593")
```
